originalText.text: Dorothy’s Petcare is the best and most trustworthy place to leave your dog. I’ve been using them for years. Their staff is all incredibly kind and they take amazing care of my pup. The owners are very caring and wonderful to work with. My dog can be a bit of a challenging case and they take it all in stride. I think one of the best parts of this service is that they include relief walks for your dog in their service. This is not a common practice from what I’ve found. Thank you Dorothy, Darius and team!

text.text: Dorothy’s Petcare is the best and most trustworthy place to leave your dog. I’ve been using them for years. Their staff is all incredibly kind and they take amazing care of my pup. I think one of the best parts of this service is that they include relief walks for your dog in their service. This is not a common practice from what I’ve found. Thank you Dorothy, Darius and team!

originalText.text: Dorothy and Darius, Danny, Jonathan, and everyone who has taken care of our dog has been amazing. Dorothy takes care to let me know who will be taking care of Rosie, either picking her up from my home or being with her at the shop. They take care to send videos of the dogs playing or walking, they know when Rosie hasn’t felt well. They have helped me to get her better when she was very sick (including taking us to a vet who actually saved her life, no exaggeration!). They are lovely, caring people. Dorothy and Darius are completely trust worthy, kind, helpful. Most of all, my dog loves them and all the people who walk her, especially Danny and Jonathan. She goes crazy when she sees them, even if she happens upon them in the neighborhood. I recommend Dorothy’s Petcare without hesitation.

originalText.text: I cannot express my gratitude for Darius, Dorothy, and the entire team at Dorothy's Petcare! Odara was thriving when spending her time there, and we only stopped because we moved abroad. They are attentive, careful, and compassionate. Whenever we would walk to Central Park on weekends, Odara would try to squeeze under their door, even though they were closed, because she loved spending time there - and this is the best feedback we can get from dogs ^^  I highly recommend them to anyone and if I ever go back to NYC, they are surely my first and only choice.

text.text: I cannot express my gratitude for Darius, Dorothy, and the entire team at Dorothy's Petcare! Odara was thriving when spending her time there, and we only stopped because we moved abroad. They are attentive, careful, and compassionate. Whenever we would walk to Central Park on weekends, Odara would try to squeeze under their door, even though they were closed, because she loved spending time there - and this is the best feedback we can get from dogs ^^  I highly recommend them to anyone and if I ever go back to NYC, they are surely my first and only choice.

originalText.text: Darius and Dorothy are absolutely fabulous.  I had always had my dog stay with my parents when I went away so this was my first experience boarding her at overnight and my dog Pippa and I could not have had a better experience.  Darius and Dorothy made the process so easy and are extremely responsive and thorough with getting all of my information and meeting with me and Pippa prior to her stay.  They even let me bring Pippa's favorite faux fur blanket with her so she could sleep on it.  They emailed me several times while I away, updating me with how Pippa was doing along with photos.  I would recommend them to anyone who is looking for a dog sitter - not just because they are so professional, but that they truly love dogs and are such caring and compassionate people.

originalText.text: We've been clients of Dorothy and Darius for nearly one year and could not be happier with the level of service they provide.  The care and attention to detail their entire team provides, reassures us that our girl Rossi is in good hands. We never have to worry about schedules or issues, they treat us and our girl like family. We highly recommend Dorothy's Petcare, without hesitation.
